#Ejemplo Mrd

##Configuraciones

```{r misconfig, include=false}
setwd("~/Ejercicios R")
##Librerias para instalar 

install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("treemap")
install.packages("openair")
install.packages("quantmod")
install.packages("readxl")
install.packages("lubridate")
##cargar librerias


library(tidyverse)
library(openair)
library(quantmod)

##stock data

library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(treemap)

##Gramática de los gráficos

ggplot(data=diamonds,aes(x=carat,y=price))+
  geom_point()+
  stat_smooth(method=lm)+
  scale_x_log10()+
  scale_y_log10()


```

```{r datacarros, include=false}
#str
str(mpg)
#summary
print("  ----- ")
summary(mpg)
#documentacion 
?mpg
#hello plot
ggplot(data=mpg)+
geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy))+
xlab("tamaño del motor")+
ylab("eficiencia del carro en carretera")
#hello plot 1
ggplot(data=mpg)+
geom_point(mapping=aes(x=hwy,y=cyl))+
xlab("eficiencia del carro en carretera")+
ylab("Numero de cilindros")
#hello plot2
ggplot(data=mpg)+
geom_point(mapping=aes(x=class,y=drv))+
xlab("tipo de carro")+
ylab("tracción")
#ggplot carros EJ1
ggplot(data=mpg)+
+ geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy, color=class))
#ggplot size
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class,size=cyl))
#ggplot size 1
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,alpha=class))
#ggplot size 2
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,shape=class,color=class))
#ggplot size 3
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class))+
  facet_wrap(~class,nrow=2)
#ggplot size 3
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class))+
  facet_wrap(drv~cyl)
#ggplot size 3
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=drv,y=cyl))

#ggplot size 3 ej 2
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class))+
  facet_grid(drv~.)
#ggplot size 3 ej 2.1
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class))+
  facet_grid(.~cyl)
#ggplot objetos geometricos
ggplot(data=mpg)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class))+
  geom_smooth(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,linetype=drv))
 #ggplot dataset Diamonds
ggplot(data=diamonds)+
geom_bar(mapping=aes(x=cut))
#ggplot statcount
ggplot(data=diamonds)+
stat_count(mapping=aes(x=cut))
#Ejercicio 4 bicicletas
daily_data$Date=as.Date(daily_data$dteday)


```
